net.proteusframework.internet.support.xml

Class RequestResponseTagListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.xml.TagListener<RequestResponseTagListenerConfiguration>
      • net.proteusframework.internet.support.xml.RequestResponseTagListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HTMLNoEndTagListener, ScriptTagListener, URLTagListener

    public abstract class RequestResponseTagListener
extends TagListener<RequestResponseTagListenerConfiguration>
    Tag listener for generic parsing code that writes directly to a response. This is useful when transforming the xml during rendering. You could also use XSLT if that is more appropriate. The request is available to get the locale or parameters.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
